formElement.documentation: Previously defined configuration for the plugin
formElement.label: Configuration Name:

formElement.documentation: The name of the pipeline job, e.g. $[/myPipeline/pipelineName]
formElement.label: Name of the Pipeline.:

formElement.documentation: Path pointing to the Pipeline Run job requesting approval, e.g. /flow/#pipeline-run/$[/myPipeline/pipelineId]/$[/myPipelineRuntime/flowRuntimeId/]
formElement.label: Path to the Pipeline Run Job.:

formElement.documentation: Number of the Change Template to apply when creating the Request for Change in TOPdesk
formElement.label: templateNumber:

formElement.documentation: External number referring to the failed job to show in TOPdesk
formElement.label: externalNumber:

formElement.documentation: The correlationId that points to the Manual approval gate, e.g. /flowRuntime/$[/myPipelineRuntime/id]/stage/$[/myStage/stageName]/gate/$[/myGate/gateType]/taskName/[task_name_of_the_manual_step]
formElement.label: correlationId:
